item.title: ğŸ“š Publications
item.description:
1. Framing Cancer in Media: Analyzing Risk Communication in Newspaper Reporting #

  • Authors: Biswas, A., Mir, H., Sultana, N., Shozol, S. A., & Talukder, M. U.
  • Conference: International Crisis and Risk Communication Conference (ICRCC)
  • Date: March 2025
  • Location: Clemson University, Clemson, South Carolina, USA
  • Contribution: Developed research framework, conducted topic modeling, authored Method and Result chapters, and contributed to writing materials.

2. Communicating Health: Framing Health-Related News in Developed and Least Developed Countries During COVID-19 #

  • Authors: Tasnim, F., Hasib, M., Shozol, S. A., Sultana, N., Akil, M., & Biswas, A.
  • Conference: Canadian Communication Association
  • Date: June 2025
  • Location: George Brown College, Toronto, Ontario
  • Contribution: Performed data scraping, wrote Method and Result chapters, conducted analysis and topic modeling.

3. Framing Russia-Ukraine War in the Newspapers of Bangladesh: A Topic Modeling Approach #

  • Authors: Nath, C. D., Biswas, A., Sultana, N., & Shozol, S. A.
  • Journal: South Asian Journal of Social Sciences and Humanities, 5(2), 252â€“267
  • Date: 2024
  • DOI: 10.48165/sajssh.2024.5215
  • Contribution: Authored writing materials and Method chapter, performed news scraping and topic modeling analysis.

4. Exploring Online Discourse of ChatGPT Through Sentiment Analysis and Topic Modelling #

  • Authors: Hasib, M., & Shozol, S. A.
  • Conference: Promoting Cross-disciplinary Research
  • Date: April 2024
  • Location: Texas Tech University
  • Format: Poster session
  • Contribution: Conducted Twitter scraping, performed sentiment analysis and topic modeling, designed the poster, and contributed to writing and Method chapter.
